Improvements.Description: Hard-coded strings like 'vpc-2azs-', 's3-virusscan-', 'vpc/vpc-2azs.yaml', 'template.yaml', 'ParentVPCStack', 'ScanQueueArn', 'no-virus.txt', 'virus.txt' and 'X5O!P%@AP[4\PZX54(P^)7CC)7}$EICAR-STANDARD-ANTIVIRUS-TEST-FILE!$H+H*' should be extracted into constants for better readability and maintainability.
The boolean expressions that are compared with 'true' or 'false' can be simplified by removing the comparison.
